properties.Name: CustomerCharacteristic

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CharacteristicTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a physical characteristic.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: CustomerCharacteristicValue
Columns.Description: A value or text field regarding the customer characteristic.

Columns.Name: CustomerCharacteristicNumber
Columns.Description: A numeric value associated with the customer characteristic.

Columns.Name: CustomerCharacteristicNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer characteristic.
